name: Eidolon: Embers in the wind
description:
Eidolon: Embers in the wind is an AR comic created by Rodwin Malinga, Daniel Hartwell and Erik Prinz. the project took just under 4 months to complete and is a visual adaptation of a light novel chapter, written by Rodwin Malinga. 

The comic is meant to be read in conjunction with the light novel and makes use of augmented reality to bring the visuals to life.
